name: Fanfiction.net - A whole new website for your eyes
description:
Complete reskin of Fanfiction.net, made for my girlfriend. If you like this theme, say thanks to Hestiana. ;)

~ If you find a bug or you have a great idea what else should I change, please use "Discussions [Start new]" ~
obsoletion_message:
Deleted by admin - contains non-loading images - Dec 5 2012

checked all the pictures, all working well, no idea what was the problem...
additional_info:
2013.04.01
Fixed the new things, or at least the most of them, if you noticed anything else to fix, let me know. I am not using this site, so I won't notice bugs by myself. :)

2012.06.09
Nargus & robbo266 fixed some issues, say thanks to them :)
And I had time, to fix a few other things, like big blue review button, and a title somewhere.
And the search button, and the too wide page, and so on.
This is the simplest page i've ever CSSd and yet the most chance for annoying bugs...

2011.05.27
Cleared the code from unnecessary entries + Fixed most of the things, added visited links (lighter brown) for the proper links. The forum TextArea (post a comment) is buggy as hell, but at least it's working, I'll see if I can fix it :)

2011.05.26
Thanks to HostilePlatypus, fixed the menu issues. Since I'm not realy using this site, didn't notice this little missing :)
Oh Yeah, the forum looks really awfull :D I'll fix it in a few days ^^


2011.05.03
Fixed not showing texts/fonts Bug.
Mobile version is still buggy, because mobiles usually not using Userstyles :) so I wont make it look nice, unless someone say otherwise.


2011.04.21
Uploaded the CSS, hope its buggless, but of course I will try to fix everything if something is wrong.

~ Tested on Windows 7 x64, Firefox 6.01a Nightly build, with newest Stylish, and Adblock Plus ~
